reviews.review_msg: One of the most content dense course I've ever taken. 5 question prelab quiz weekly that makes you read 50 pages of the lab manual, 2-3 hour long lectures weekly, and labs that are relatively easy. Midterms&finals are the hardest thing. Don't take this course unless you have to! Avoid this course at all costs. You have to dedicate 5-9 hours a week.

The prof is really good at explaining and makes the lecture interesting, there are 2 midterms and finals and there is also mandatory library work. The midterms were difficult and the course material is a lot, so study daily or weekly or else there will be too much material for you to study by the time the exam is close.
